attributes.action: STOP charging Tax to Charity Orgnisations and Charity Subsidiaries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolish all levels of taxation for Charity Organisations & Charity Subsidiaries. Including corporation tax  and V.A.T . Allow all ‘profit’ made  to be re-invested  directly into the said charities work. Do not set minimum and maximum values for re-investment amounts.
